languages.text: {n}Ульфар указывает на другой наплечник, где изображена черная звериная голова, и наставительно изрекает:{/n} "Это — Великий Волк Черногрив, покровитель убийц и тотем нашей великой роты, носящей имя Черногривых. Все знают, что мы — грозные и жадные до драки воины, коварные, смертоносные и не прощающие. Имя наше гремит гордо!"

{n}Ulfar points at the other shoulder pad, depicting a black beast head, and he declares in the tone of one instructing,{/n} "This is the Great Blackmane Wolf, patron of slayers and totem of our Great Company, the Blackmanes. All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар указывает на другой наплечник, где изображена черная звериная голова, и наставительно изрекает:{/n} "Это — Великий Волк Черногрив, покровитель убийц и тотем нашей великой роты, носящей имя Черногривых. Все знают, что мы — грозные и жадные до драки воины, коварные, смертоносные и не прощающие. Имя наше гремит гордо!"

All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

languages.text: {n}乌尔法指着另一边的肩甲，上面画着一颗黑色的兽头。他以指导般的语气开了口。{/n}“这是黑鬃恶狼，屠戮者的守护神，我们所在的大型连队的图腾。所有人都知道，我们是可怕的战士，渴望战争与杀戮。我们狡猾而致命，从不对敌人手下留情。只要说出我们的名字，就会听到滚滚而来的雷鸣！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at the other shoulder pad, depicting a black beast head, and he declares in the tone of one instructing,{/n} "This is the Great Blackmane Wolf, patron of slayers and totem of our Great Company, the Blackmanes. All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法指着另一边的肩甲，上面画着一头狼，散发着太阳之火的光晕。他以指导般的语气开了口。{/n}“这是日狼，荣耀的守护者，也是我们所在的大型连队‘屠龙巨狼’的图腾。所有人都知道，我们屠龙巨狼是一群渴求荣耀的疯子，我们从不拒绝挑战与殴斗。”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar señala a su otra hombrera, que lleva la imagen de la cabeza de una bestia negra, y declara en tono didáctico:{/n} «Este es Melenanegra, el patrón de los matadores y tótem de nuestra Gran Compañía, los Melenanegras. Todo el mundo sabe que somos temibles y que ansiamos la batalla. Que somos astutos, mortales y despiadados. ¡Al pronunciar nuestro nombre, el trueno retumba!».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at the other shoulder pad, depicting a black beast head, and he declares in the tone of one instructing,{/n} "This is the Great Blackmane Wolf, patron of slayers and totem of our Great Company, the Blackmanes. All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar señala a su otra hombrera, que lleva la imagen de un lobo con el fondo del fuego de un sol, y declara en tono didáctico:{/n} «Este es el Lobo Solar, el patrón de los orgullosos y tótem de nuestra Gran Compañía, los Matadragones. Todo el mundo sabe que los Matadragones son unos lunáticos sedientos de gloria que no renuncian a un desafío ni a una buena pelea».

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは黒い獣の頭が描かれたもう片方の肩当てを指差し、教えるような口振りでハッキリと言う。{/n}「これは偉大なるブラックメイン・ウルフ、戦士の守護獣で、我ら群狼団ブラックメインの象徴でもある。俺達が凶悪で戦いに飢え、狡猾かつ危険、容赦がないことを知らない者はいない。俺達の名前を口にすれば、雷鳴が鳴り響くさ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at the other shoulder pad, depicting a black beast head, and he declares in the tone of one instructing,{/n} "This is the Great Blackmane Wolf, patron of slayers and totem of our Great Company, the Blackmanes. All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーはもう片方の肩当てを指差すと、そこには太陽の炎の後光を浴びた狼が描かれていた。そして、導くような口調で続ける{/n}「これはサンウルフ、群狼団『竜屠り』の誇りと証を支持するものだ。竜屠りは栄光に飢えた狂人であり、挑戦や戦いの機会を決して断らないことは誰もが知っている」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar deutet auf die andere Schulterklappe, die den Kopf einer schwarzen Bestie zeigt, und erklärt im Ton eines Lehrmeisters:{/n} "Dies ist der Große Schwarzmähnenwolf, Schutzherr der Slayers und Totem unserer Großkompanie, der Blackmanes. Alle wissen, dass wir furchterregend sind und nach der Schlacht gieren, dass wir klug und tödlich sind und niemals Gnade zeigen. Sprecht unseren Namen, und der Donner grollt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at the other shoulder pad, depicting a black beast head, and he declares in the tone of one instructing,{/n} "This is the Great Blackmane Wolf, patron of slayers and totem of our Great Company, the Blackmanes. All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar deutet auf die andere Schulterklappe, die einen Wolf in einem Heiligenschein aus Sonnenfeuer zeigt, und er erklärt im Ton eines Lehrmeisters:{/n} "Dies ist der Sonnenwolf, Schutzherr der Stolzen und Totem unserer Großkompanie, der Drachentöter. Alle wissen, dass die Slayers Wahnsinnige sind, die nach Ruhm gieren und nie eine Herausforderung oder die Chance auf einen Kampf ablehnen."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar pointe du doigt l'autre épaulière, ornée de la tête d'une bête noire, et déclare d'un ton professoral :{/n} « Voici le Grand Loup noir, patron des Drakeslayers et totem de notre Grande Compagnie, les Crinières Noires. Notre réputation de terreurs assoiffées de combat n'est plus à faire, et tous savent à quel point nous sommes rusés et impitoyables. Il suffit de prononcer notre nom pour que gronde le tonnerre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at the other shoulder pad, depicting a black beast head, and he declares in the tone of one instructing,{/n} "This is the Great Blackmane Wolf, patron of slayers and totem of our Great Company, the Blackmanes. All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar pointe du doigt l'autre épaulière, qui représente un loup pris dans un halo de lumière solaire, et déclare d'un ton professoral :{/n} « Voici le Loup du Soleil, patron des fiers et totem de notre Grande Compagnie, les Drakeslayers. Tout le monde sait que les Drakeslayers sont des fous qui ont soif de gloire et qui ne refusent jamais une bonne bagarre ou l'occasion de relever un défi. »

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at the other shoulder pad, depicting a black beast head, and he declares in the tone of one instructing,{/n} "This is the Great Blackmane Wolf, patron of slayers and totem of our Great Company, the Blackmanes. All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, siyah bir canavar başını tasvir eden diğer omuz vatkasını gösteriyor ve öğretici bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bu, Ulu Karayele Kurdu'dur, katillerin efendisi ve Büyük Bölüğümüz Karayelelerin totemidir. Herkes bizim korkunç, savaşa aç, becerikli ve acımasız olduğumuzu bilir. Adımız duyulunca şimşekler çakar!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at the other shoulder pad, depicting a black beast head, and he declares in the tone of one instructing,{/n} "This is the Great Blackmane Wolf, patron of slayers and totem of our Great Company, the Blackmanes. All know that we are fearsome and hungry for the struggle of war, that we are cunning, deadly, and show no mercy. Speak our name and thunder rolls!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, siyah bir canavar başını tasvir eden diğer omuz vatkasını gösteriyor ve öğretici bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bu, Yüce Karayele Kurdu'dur, katillerin efendisi ve Büyük Bölüğümüz Karayelelerin totemidir. Herkes bizim korkunç, savaşa aç, becerikli ve acımasız olduğumuzu bilir. Adımız duyulunca şimşekler çakar!"
